page.title: 06Life in Cheadle Hume.
page.content: A lady who had lived in Cheadle Hulme for 46 years was asked about her views on the area.She lives in a house that is over a 100 years old. That is quite unusual.Most houses in Cheadle Hulme have been built in the last 30 years.She likes the area very much. Before the school was built there were open fields and hardly any houses. People usually worked locally. Nowadays,many people travel to work in Stockport or Manchester.Most of the aeroplanes are a nuisance because they go over the houses and disturb the peace.The lady's hobbies include darts and bingo. The house has two bedrooms, a lounge, a kitchen a larder,and a loft but no cellar.It is installed with gas and electricity,and has a telephone.The house is well located for local shops,libraries and other such amenities.
